net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin

Class Plugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Plugin

  • public class Plugin
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents any Plugin that may be loaded at runtime to enhance existing functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • getSLF4JLogger

        public org.slf4j.Logger getSLF4JLogger()

      • onLoad

        public void onLoad()
        Called when the plugin has just been loaded. Most of the proxy will not be initialized, so only use it for registering ConfigurationAdapter's and other predefined behavior. ProxyMC: Use for registering Services via the ServicesManager

      • onEnable

        public void onEnable()
        Called when this plugin is enabled.

      • onDisable

        public void onDisable()
        Called when this plugin is disabled.

      • getDataFolder

        public final java.io.File getDataFolder()
        Gets the data folder where this plugin may store arbitrary data. It will be a child of ProxyServer.getPluginsFolder().
        Returns:
        the data folder of this plugin

      • getResourceAsStream

        public final java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String name)
        Get a resource from within this plugins jar or container. Care must be taken to close the returned stream.
        Parameters:
        name - the full path name of this resource
        Returns:
        the stream for getting this resource, or null if it does not exist

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the plugin's name This is shortcut to PluginDescription#getName()
        Returns:
        plugin name

      • saveDefaultConfig

        public void saveDefaultConfig(boolean replaceExistingIfExists)
        Creates a default config file with an option of replacing the existing config with a new one.
        Parameters:
        replaceExistingIfExists - replaces the existing config (not recommended)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the jar does not contain a config file

      • getConfig

        public net.md_5.bungee.config.Configuration getConfig()
        Gets the default config file
        Returns:
        the config

      • reloadConfig

        public void reloadConfig()
        Reloads the configuration. If the file does not exist it will be generated

      • saveConfig

        public void saveConfig()
        Saves the config. Warning: This will delete all of the comments you have into the configuration

      • getExecutorService

        public java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getExecutorService()
